description:
#70 Unable to locate account %(account_name) on Solidfire device 
should be Unable to locate account %(account_name)s on Solidfire device.
An 's' is missing after %(account_name) .  nova.pot should be synchronized with the source code.
title: LP Translations strings are not updated (was: Translation Item #70 should be updated)

comments.content:
Hi,

In nova.pot, it is Unable to locate account %(account_name)s on Solidfire 
device 
There is the "s" after %(account_name), but online translation missed the 
"s".



Could anyone please update the online translation? 
Many thanks.


Best wishes.
Vincent Hou (侯胜博)

comments.content: Looking at https://translations.launchpad.net/nova it appears the strings offered for translation are not updated (probably because they draw from lp:nova/trunk which is not updated either)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Openstack Infra now runs jobs once a day that update the .pot file for nova. These updates are then proposed as changes in gerrit so that they can be reviewed and approved. This only happens if there are significant changes to merge. And only one change is ever open at one time. If an existing change is found a new patchset to that change is proposed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cboylan
